TopicTitle: Moar Boosters update Inverted my mouse wheel

Articles.Content: After installing the newest update, my mouse wheel has been inverted.  Scroll up now zooms out or pans down, scroll down now zooms in or pans up.  This is true even when scrolling through menus or scrolling through part during vehicle assembly.  I see no in game options to change this.  Has this happened to anyone else?

3 hours ago, kerbalkaan said:

After installing the newest update, my mouse wheel has been inverted.  Scroll up now zooms out or pans down, scroll down now zooms in or pans up.  This is true even when scrolling through menus or scrolling through part during vehicle assembly.  I see no in game options to change this.  Has this happened to anyone else?

Yes I have the same issue. I noticed this in the changelog: 

Fix Maneuver editor so that the mouse wheel adjusts the node now in the contrary direction (same behavior as dragging down/up).

But that does not describe this effect: parts in VAB now scroll in an inverted direction; gameplay zoom now works in an inverted direction.

For reference I am running an unmodded version of the linux build, with files verified in steam.

Which OS are you using @kerbalkaan and @dnbattley? Linux?
(Please have a look at how to report errors in the Stock Support & Bug Reporting Guide.)

Anyway, @JimmyR reported a hotfix in another thread (http:// https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/188955-mouse-wheel-in-reverse/): change "scale = 1" to "scale = -1" in the settings.cfg under "AXIS_MOUSEWHEEL".
